item.title: When to NOT use Kubernetes
item.author: Patrick Deutsch
item.description: When Kubernetes Might Not Be the Best Choice Have you ever wondered if using a Kubernetes for a small to medium scale application is worth the complexity and overhead? In many cases, the benefits might not outweigh the costs (financial or emotional) or the added complexity needed to maintain a Kubernetes platform, particularly when the applications require few resources and have low traffic volume. When does Kubernetes make sense for your application?
